verbose_text: The data indicated that the inhibition of JAK2 (by AG490) or STAT1 (by S1491) enhanced the protective role of HSYA by improving cell viability and decreasing the release of cTnI, IL-6 and LDH.
evidence: JAK2 (by AG490) or STAT1 (by S1491) enhanced the protective role of HSYA by improving cell viability and decreasing the release of cTnI, IL-6 and LDH
